segments.text: Excuse me , you look lost.Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Thank you . I'm looking for the train station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right.Let me see.You go straight down here and turn right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then take the next left then the next right.Are you with me ?
segments.speaker: S1
